summary: This document is a financial statement from Deutsche Bank detailing account transactions for the month of November 2013. It includes information on deposits, debits, and the ending balance, as well as instructions for addressing errors in the statement.

persons.name: Darren K. Indyke
persons.context: Darren K. Indyke is listed as the account holder for the business checking account detailed in the financial statement.

persons.name: Amanda Kirby
persons.context: Amanda Kirby is mentioned as a contact for personal assistance regarding the account.

keyFacts: The account balance as of November 30, 2013, was $157,013.99.
The statement includes multiple preauthorized debits for services from ADP.
Darren K. Indyke is the account holder associated with the transactions listed.
The document provides instructions for addressing errors in the account statement.
The statement covers transactions from November 1 to November 30, 2013.
